div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 137 Megara, 1904 (668) Burial: c. 295 B.C. (Price) Contents: 163 AR Alexander III: 52 lifetime and early post. dr. (Asia Minor mints) Philip III: 7 dr. (Asia Minor mints) Lysimachus: 4 dr. (Alexander types, Colo- phon) Tegea: 1 dr. Disposition: Athens 64 as listed Svoronos, VAN 1905, p. 255 (brief mention only). Detailed list of varieties in ANS
